item.description:
For this meeting, Flexible Work Advisor Pat Katepoo ( http://www.workoptions.com/index.htm) will join us in a webinar to discuss successfully negotiating flexible work options with an employer. She will discuss telecommuting, compressed work week, flexible hours, part-time, job sharing and maternity leave.

Note: We were originally going to meet in person at the Framingham Library for this event, but have decided to make it strictly a webinar.  To register, go to  https://www2.gotomeeting.com/register/992703387  Then come join us in person for another upcoming event!
item.name: Webinar: Negotiating Flexible Work Options
